live_updates: We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
